channel.title: Help with 317 word blocking
channel.description: Hello. My server I'm using will block out things you say such as "idk" and most curse words. When you type it will do id then when you type k it will show up as "i||" and it looks like you just type "i". Any way I can change this?

item.title: Help with 317 word blocking
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:5, topic:403684”][quote author=xneonx link=topic=500748.msg3662857#msg3662857 date=1310441261]
Hello. My server I’m using will block out things you say such as “idk” and most curse words. When you type it will do id then when you type k it will show up as “i||” and it looks like you just type “i”. Any way I can change this?
[/quote]
Source base?[/quote]
It’s a delta I think it was called like pk planet or something

Read full topic

Hello. My server I’m using will block out things you say such as “idk” and most curse words. When you type it will do id then when you type k it will show up as “i||” and it looks like you just type “i”. Any way I can change this?

item.title: Help with 317 word blocking
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:2, topic:403684”][quote author=xneonx link=topic=500748.msg3662857#msg3662857 date=1310441261]
Hello. My server I’m using will block out things you say such as “idk” and most curse words. When you type it will do id then when you type k it will show up as “i||” and it looks like you just type “i”. Any way I can change this?
[/quote]
Search for the blocked out words in your server files.[/quote]
I have done this many times and I can’t find it =\ I’ve been trying to find out how to take it out for a while now haha

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 317 word blocking
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

xneonx:

Hello. My server I’m using will block out things you say such as “idk” and most curse words. When you type it will do id then when you type k it will show up as “i||” and it looks like you just type “i”. Any way I can change this?

Search for the blocked out words in your server files.

Read full topic
